subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Usage limits on GPT-4o are higher than free tier but are not publicly specified and can change based on demand.
5x more usage than the free tier, with a maximum limit that is not publicly disclosed.
Included via Google One AI Premium, usage is not token-limited but subject to fair use policies.

llama_3_1_70b.note: Open-source model (free to run). Prices are for running on-demand via a cloud provider like AWS Bedrock. No official subscription.

llama_3_1_8b.note: Open-source model (free to run). Prices are for running on-demand via a cloud provider like AWS Bedrock. No official subscription.

subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Unlimited usage across web, mobile, and Office apps (with access during peak times).

copilot_pro.note: Pricing is subscription-based for integrated experiences, not direct pay-per-token for consumers. Enterprise price is per user/month.

pricing_analysis.trend: Rapid price deflation and a 'race to the bottom' for API access. Small, highly efficient models like Haiku, Gemini Flash, and DeepSeek are setting new price floors. Bundled subscription models are becoming the standard for consumer access to premium models, while pay-as-you-go APIs dominate developer and enterprise use cases.
